/* production/flow/search/selectProcessFlowList */ select a2.vehicle_id, a1.kind, a1.client, a1.model_car, a1.product_name, lh_rh, weight, gate_weight, p1, a1, f1, p2, p3, f2, a2, p4, (p5*-1) p5, (p4 - a1) d1, product_no, cnt from ( select kind, model_car, product_name, client, count(*) cnt from ( select kind, model_car, product_name, client from ( select 1 as gubun, ep.vehicle_id, ep.production, ep.faulty from packing_ejection_produce ep inner join packing_ejection e on (e.e_id = ep.e_id) where 1=1
AND REPLACE(e.ejection_date, '-', '') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{dateStart}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{dateEnd}, '-', '')
union all select 2 as gubun, vp.vehicle_id, vp.production, null from packing_vaccum_produce vp inner join packing_vaccum v on (v.e_id = vp.e_id) where 1=1
AND REPLACE(v.vaccum_date, '-', '') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{dateStart}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{dateEnd}, '-', '')
union all select 3 as gubun, i.vehicle_id, i.production, i.faulty from packing_inspection i where 1=1
AND REPLACE(i.inspection_date, '-', '') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{dateStart}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{dateEnd}, '-', '')
) a inner join vehicle_management vm on (vm.vehicle_id = a.vehicle_id) group by vm.vehicle_id ) g1 group by kind, model_car, product_name, client ) a1 inner join ( select kind, client, model_car, product_name, lh_rh, vm.vehicle_id, weight, gate_weight, product_no, sum(case when gubun=1 then production end) as 'p1', sum(case when gubun=1 then production end) - sum(case when gubun=1 then faulty end) as 'a1', sum(case when gubun=1 then faulty end) as 'f1', sum(case when gubun=2 then production end) as 'p2', sum(case when gubun=3 then production end) as 'p3', sum(case when gubun=3 then faulty end) as 'f2', sum(case when gubun=3 then production end) - sum(case when gubun=3 then faulty end) as 'a2' from ( select 1 as gubun, ep.vehicle_id, ep.production, ep.faulty from packing_ejection_produce ep inner join packing_ejection e on (e.e_id = ep.e_id) where 1=1
AND REPLACE(e.ejection_date, '-', '') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{dateStart}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{dateEnd}, '-', '')
union all select 2 as gubun, vp.vehicle_id, vp.production, null from packing_vaccum_produce vp inner join packing_vaccum v on (v.e_id = vp.e_id) where 1=1
AND REPLACE(v.vaccum_date, '-', '') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{dateStart}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{dateEnd}, '-', '')
union all select 3 as gubun, i.vehicle_id, i.production, i.faulty from packing_inspection i where 1=1
AND REPLACE(i.inspection_date, '-', '') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{dateStart}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{dateEnd}, '-', '')
) a inner join vehicle_management vm on (vm.vehicle_id = a.vehicle_id) group by vm.vehicle_id ) a2 on a1.kind=a2.kind and a1.model_car=a2.model_car and a1.product_name=a2.product_name and a1.client=a2.client left join ( select vehicle_id, sum(case when stock_gubun='s006' then quantity end) as 'p4', sum(case when stock_gubun='s004' then quantity end) as 'p5' from stock where 1=1
AND REPLACE(stock_date, '-', '') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{dateStart}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{dateEnd}, '-', '')
group by vehicle_id ) a3 on (a2.vehicle_id = a3.vehicle_id) order by kind, client, model_car, product_name
